titleStmt.title: An account of the behaviour of Sir John Fenwick, at his execution on Tower-Hill with the copy of the paper delivered by him to the sheriffs of London, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: for John Salusbury at the Rising-Sun in Cornhill ;

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
